gate.learning.learners
Class SupervisedLearner

java.lang.Object
  gate.learning.learners.SupervisedLearner
Direct Known Subclasses:
Paum, PaumForExec, SvmForExec, SvmLibSVM
public abstract class SupervisedLearner
extends Object

The abstract class for supervised binary learner. The implemented class is SvmLibSVM.java so far.
